name: Artisan
effect: Gain a card to your hand costing up to 5. Put a card from your hand onto your deck.

name: Bandit
effect: Gain a Gold. Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of their deck, trashes a revealed treasure other than Copper, and discards the rest.

name: Bureaucrat
effect: Gain a Silver onto your deck. Each other player revealse a Victory card from their hand and puts it onto their deck (or revealse a hand with no Victory cards).

name: Cellar
effect: +1 Action; Discard any number of cards, then draw that many.

name: Chapel
effect: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.

name: Council Room
effect: + 4 cards; + 1 buy; Each other player draws a card.

name: Festival
effect: +2 actions; +1 buy; +2 coins.

name: Gardens
worth: 1 Victory Point per 10 cards you have (round down).

name: Harbinger
effect: +1 card; +1 action; Look thorugh your discard pile. You may put a card from it onto your deck.

name: Laboratory
effect: +2 cards; +1 action.

name: Library
effect: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand, skipping any Action cards you choose to; set those aside, discarding them afterwards.

name: Market
effect: +1 card; +1 action; +1 buy; +1 coin.

name: Merchant
effect: +1 card; +1 action; The first time you play a silver this turn, + 1 coin.

name: Militia
effect: +2 coins; Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.

name: Mine
effect: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. Gain a Treasure to your hand costing up to 3 coins more than it.

name: Moat
effect: +2 cards; When another player plays an Attack card, you may first reveal this from your hand, to be unaffected by it.

name: Moneylender
effect: You may trash a Copper from your hand for +3 coins.

name: Poacher
effect: +1 card; +1 action; +1 coin; Discard a card per empty supply pile.

name: Remodel
effect: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 2 coins more than it.

name: Sentry
effect: +1 card; +1 action; Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Trash and/or discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.

name: Smithy
effect: +3 cards.

name: Throne Room
effect: You may play an Action card from your hand twice.

name: Vassal
effect: +2 coins; Discard the top card of your deck. If it's an Action, you may play it.

name: Village
effect: +1 card; +2 actions.

name: Witch
effect: +2 cards; Each other player gains a Curse.

name: Workshop
effect: Gain a card costing up to 4 coins.
